project.name: backup
project.description:
There are two Java subprojects within the 'java' parent project: 1) 'altgraph_data_app' Data-oriented code; is copied into the web app 2) 'altgraph_web_app' Spring-based Web application
The 'altgraph_data_app' subproject is where the data-oriented and common code is developed. This common code is then copied, via this Ant script, to the web app. This approach allows the code to be developed and tested in the data app first before deploying it to the web app.
Some data files are also copied from the data app to the web app, see target 'copyData'.
Usage: ant -f copy_to_web_app.xml
Chris Joakim, Microsoft, November 2022
